data.text:
In Frank Herbert

(1976), God-Emperor of Dune (1981), Heretics of Dune (1984), and Chapterhouse: Dune (1985). These books followed Paul Atreides and House Atreides through future millennia. In the late 1990s Herbert’s son Brian began collaborating with Kevin J. Anderson on books set in the world of Dune, employing some of the elder…

Read More

In Dune: Publication and adaptations

…God Emperor of Dune (1981), Heretics of Dune (1984), and Chapterhouse: Dune (1985). Herbert died in 1986, and in 1999 his son Brian Herbert and author Kevin J. Anderson began writing novels set in the world of Dune.
